Rams - Original Soundtrack Album

Artist
Brian Eno
Release date
29 Aug 2020
Format
Vinyl
Details
LP, Album, Record Store Day, Stereo, White
Genres
Electronic, Stage & Screen
View on Discogs

Tracklist

  1. Bright Clouds Of Metal
  2. Harmonic Guitar
  3. Unusual Temperament
  4. A Warm Sweet Bed
  5. Beautiful Metals
  6. Designer Piano
  7. Generative Lounge
  8. Design As Reduction
  9. Al'Khwarizmi Piano
  10. Shimmering Future
  11. For A New Design

Notes

Released for Record Store Day. Edition of 2,500 copies. Taken from the documentary film “Rams,” produced and directed by Gary Hustwit. Some copies come with a download code included. Made in Germany
